thread.title: What is a democratic socialist? Bernie Sanders tries to redefine the name
thread.title_full: What is a democratic socialist? Bernie Sanders tries to redefine the name - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: What is a democratic socialist? Bernie Sanders tries to redefine the name
text: When Sen. Bernie Sanders came to speak in Iowa a few months ago, Drake University student Ian Miller snagged a seat on the stage. It was a close-up look at a historic campaign: After decades where socialists were the enemy, a "democratic socialist" had come to town as a serious candidate for president.... ...
